Earnings Call Insights: TILT Holdings Inc. (TLLTF) Q4 2024

Management View

  • CEO Tim Conder highlighted that TILT Holdings has been undergoing a strategic review of its plant-touching business, resulting in the announcement of a definitive agreement to divest its Massachusetts retail
